company_command.name: Company Command
company_command.description: A higher-ranking field officer trained to command more units and occasionally direct field operations.

platoon_command_inexperienced.name: Inexperienced Platoon Command
platoon_command_inexperienced.description: A lower-ranking platoon commander to provide support to other field units.

platoon_command.name: Platoon Command
platoon_command.description: A lower-ranking platoon commander to provide support to other field units.

commissar.name: Commissar
commissar.description: An officer dedicated to keeping officers and higher soldiers in line.

field_medic.name: Field Medic
field_medic.description: A trained field medic used to treat the wounded near the frontline.

forward_artillery_observer.name: Forward Artillery Observer
forward_artillery_observer.description: An artillery forward observer able to call in a fire mission.

combat_engineers.name: Combat Engineers
combat_engineers.description: A squad of soviet combat engineers.

assault_engineers.name: Assault Engineers
assault_engineers.description: A squad of soviet assault engineers.

shtrafbat_squad.name: Shtrafbat Squad
shtrafbat_squad.description: A group of redeeming Soviet riflemen.

conscript_squad.name: Conscript Squad
conscript_squad.description: A group of conscripted Soviet riflemen.

smg_squad.name: SMG Squad
smg_squad.description: A group of Soviet soldiers equipped with SMGs.

veteran_smg_squad.name: Veteran SMG Squad
veteran_smg_squad.description: A group of Soviet soldiers equipped with SMGs.

tank_riders.name: Tank Riders
tank_riders.description: A group of Soviet soldiers equipped with SMGs who ride on armored vehicles.

veteran_tank_riders.name: Veteran Tank Riders
veteran_tank_riders.description: A group of Soviet soldiers equipped with SMGs who ride on armored vehicles.

naval_infantry.name: Naval Infantry Squad
naval_infantry.description: A squad of elite Soviet riflemen.

motor_rifle_squad.name: Motor Rifle Squad
motor_rifle_squad.description: A squad of elite Soviet riflemen.

veteran_motor_rifle_squad.name: Veteran Motor Rifle Squad
veteran_motor_rifle_squad.description: A squad of elite Soviet riflemen.

scout_squad.name: Scout Squad
scout_squad.description: A group of aggressive recon troops.

tank_hunters.name: Tank Hunters
tank_hunters.description: A team dedicated to hunting tanks with anti-tank grenades.

flamethrower_team.name: Flamethrower Team
flamethrower_team.description: A team equipped to clear bunkers and other defensive positions.

dog_mine_team.name: Dog Mine Team
dog_mine_team.description: A team of handlers to guide mine-dogs into combat.

sniper_team.name: Sniper Team
sniper_team.description: A team equipped to take out important targets from a distance.

at_rifle_team.name: AT Rifle Team
at_rifle_team.description: A team dedicated to hunting lighter tanks.

light_mortar_team.name: Light Mortar Team
light_mortar_team.description: A light mortar carried by a small team.

medium_mortar_team.name: Medium Mortar Team
medium_mortar_team.description: A medium mortar carried by a small team.

heavy_mortar_team.name: Heavy Mortar Team
heavy_mortar_team.description: A heavy mortar carried by a small team.

sherman_emcha.name: Sherman "Emcha"
sherman_emcha.description: A lend-lease M4 Sherman medium tank with a decent all-round AT gun.

m4a1_sherman.name: M4A4 Sherman 76mm
m4a1_sherman.description: A medium tank with a good all-round AT gun.

ba_10.name: BA-10
ba_10.description: A recon armored car with light anti-tank support.

ba_3_6.name: BA-3/6
ba_3_6.description: An armored recon car with light anti-tank support.

ot_34.name: OT-34
ot_34.description: A medium tank with an adequate gun.

ot_34_85.name: OT-34/85
ot_34_85.description: A medium tank with a heavy gun.

t26a.name: T-26A
t26a.description: A medium tank with an adequate gun.

t26b.name: T-26B
t26b.description: An early-war light tank with a few variants with different capabilities.

t_70.name: T-70
t_70.description: A later war light tank with a few variants.

bt_5_bt_7.name: BT-5, BT-7
bt_5_bt_7.description: A light tank with exceptionally high speed for breakthroughs and encirclement.

t_28.name: T-28
t_28.description: An early large tank with with many armaments.

su_76.name: SU-76
su_76.description: A medium tank with an adequate gun.

su_76i.name: SU-76i
su_76i.description: A medium tank with an adequate gun.

t34.name: T-34/76
t34.description: A medium tank with an adequate gun.

su_85.name: SU-85
su_85.description: A medium tank with an adequate gun.

t34_command.name: T-34/76 (Command)
t34_command.description: A medium tank with an adequate gun.

t34_85.name: T-34/85
t34_85.description: A medium tank with a powerful main gun.

kv_85_is_1.name: KV-85, IS-1
kv_85_is_1.description: A medium tank with a powerful main gun.

is_2.name: IS-2
is_2.description: A medium tank with a powerful main gun.

t34_85_command.name: T34/85 (Command)
t34_85_command.description: A medium tank with a powerful main gun.

kv1.name: KV-1
kv1.description: A heavy tank that is well-armored with an adequate main gun.

kv1_s.name: KV-1S
kv1_s.description: A heavy tank with an adequate main gun and improved speed.

kv2.name: KV-2
kv2.description: A heavy tank with a huge infantry-support howitzer.

t_20_komsomolets.name: T-20 Komsomolets
t_20_komsomolets.description: A light tankette with transport capacity on top for moving small units of infantry.

m17_mgmc.name: M17 MGMC
m17_mgmc.description: An armored halftrack upgraded with several anti-air machine-guns.

m3_white_scout.name: M3 White Scout Car
m3_white_scout.description: A lightly armored scout transport car.

yak_9u.name: Yak-9U
yak_9u.description: A fighter aircraft with some ground attack capability.

la_5fn.name: La-5FN
la_5fn.description: A fighter aircraft with some light bombs.

il2_2m3.name: Il-2M3
il2_2m3.description: A fighter aircraft with some light bombs.

urah_assault.name: Urah Assault
urah_assault.flavor: A swift and deadly end to a fight can come with a furious charge...
urah_assault.description: Use when a Soviet _Infantry_ unit declares a Charge action. It gets +3" of Movement for that action.

heavy_barrage.name: Heavy Barrage
heavy_barrage.flavor: With enough shells, the enemy's morale will surely waver.
heavy_barrage.description: Use when a Soviet _Artillery_ unit with the Indirect rule fires. That weapon gains +2 Blast and if the weapon scatters, it hits the closest enemy unit within 3" instead of 1".

forward_recon.name: Forward Recon
forward_recon.flavor: Forward recon elements, when used effectively can provide a huge amount of information on enemy forces.
forward_recon.description: Use when an _Infantry_ unit enters the field. It may make a free Move action.

soviet_flag.name: Soviet Flag
soviet_flag.description: This unit gets +1 Courage when clearing shock. A model may not use its shooting weapons while carrying a Soviet Flag.

hero_sniper.name: Hero Sniper
hero_sniper.description: This model gets +1 Accuracy and all shooting attacks gain +1 AP.

lady_death.name: Lady Death
lady_death.description: This model gets +1 Accuracy and +1 Save.

crack_shot.name: Ambush Master
crack_shot.description: This unit get +1 Accuracy and enemies hit by his attacks add one to rolls on damage tables.

inspiring_tank_commander.name: Inspiring Tank Commander
inspiring_tank_commander.description: This unit and friendly _Tank_ or _Armored Car_ units within 6" get +1 Courage and +1 Initiative.

battle_hardened.name: Battle Hardened
battle_hardened.description: This model may subtract one from any rolls on Damage Tables.

medical_assistant.name: Medical Assistant
medical_assistant.description: Whenever this model, or a friendly Infantry model within 6" fails a save, roll a D10. On a 4 or less that save is not failed.

vasily_zaitsev.name: Vasily Zaitsev
vasily_zaitsev.flavor: Vasily Zaitsev was famous for his exceptionally high kill count during the battle of Stalingrad in which he killed at least 255 enemy soliders.
vasily_zaitsev.description: Upgrade one Sniper model with Hero Sniper.

lyudmila_pavlichenko.name: Lyudmila Pavlichenko
lyudmila_pavlichenko.flavor: AKA Lady Death, Pavlichenko wracked up over 300 kills, making her the most deadly female sniper in history.
lyudmila_pavlichenko.description: Upgrade one Sniper model with Lady Death.

dmitry_lavrinenko.name: Dmitry Lavrinenko
dmitry_lavrinenko.flavor: Dmitry Lavrinenko had one of the highest axis tank kill counts of the allies despite his early death in 1941.
dmitry_lavrinenko.description: Upgrade one T-34 with Crack Shot.

viktor_ivanovitch_nevsky.name: Viktor Ivanovitch Nevsky
viktor_ivanovitch_nevsky.flavor: Viktor Nevsky was well-respected and battle-hardened after fighting throughout the war for the red army.
viktor_ivanovitch_nevsky.description: Upgrade one Sherman Emcha (Command) with Battle-hardened.

mikhail_dedov.name: Mikhail Andrevitch Dedov (Tank)
mikhail_dedov.flavor: Mikhail was recognized for his leadership and motivation in many tank battles.
mikhail_dedov.description: Upgrade one T34 (Command) or T34/85 (Command) with Inspiring Tank Commander.

alexander_pylcyn.name: Alexander Pyl'cyn
alexander_pylcyn.flavor: Alexander was well known to travel with his expert medic Rita Makarievskaya.
alexander_pylcyn.description: Upgrade one Field Officer unit with Medical Assistant.
